sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Row, Col, Card, Form, Button, Table, Badge, Tab, Tabs, Alert, Modal } from 'react-bootstrap'; function UserVault() { const [assets, setAssets] = useState([]); const [trustedContacts, setTrustedContacts] = useState([]); const [showAssetModal, setShowAssetModal] = useState(false); const [showContactModal, setShowContactModal] = useState(false); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const [newAsset, setNewAsset] = useState({ assetType: 'email', platformName: '', accountIdentifier: '', credentials: '', actionType: 'delete' }); const [newContact, setNewContact] = useState({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', relationship: '' }); const handleAssetSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setLoading(true); // Simulate API call setTimeout(() => { const asset = { ...newAsset, id: Date.now(), status: 'active', createdAt: new Date().toISOString() }; setAssets([...assets, asset]); setNewAsset({ assetType: 'email', platformName: '', accountIdentifier: '', credentials: '', actionType: 'delete' }); setShowAssetModal(false); setLoading(false); }, 1000); }; const handleContactSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setLoading(true); // Simulate API call setTimeout(() => { const contact = { ...newContact, id: Date.now(), status: 'pending', createdAt: new Date().toISOString() }; setTrustedContacts([...trustedContacts, contact]); setNewContact({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', relationship: '' }); setShowContactModal(false); setLoading(false); }, 1000); }; const removeAsset = (id) => { setAssets(assets.filter(asset => asset.id !== id)); }; const removeContact = (id) => { setTrustedContacts(trustedContacts.filter(contact => contact.id !== id)); }; const getActionTypeColor = (type) => { const colors = { delete: 'danger', memorialize: 'warning', transfer: 'success', lock: 'secondary' }; return colors[type] || 'secondary'; }; return (

Digital Asset Vault

Securely manage your digital assets and trusted contacts with enterprise-grade encryption

{/* Security Notice */}
Security Notice:
All sensitive data is encrypted using AES-256 encryption and stored securely. Multi-factor authentication is required for all vault operations.
{assets.length === 0 ? (

No Assets Registered

Start securing your digital legacy by adding your first digital asset to the vault.

) : (
Registered Assets ({assets.length})
 {assets.map((asset) => ( ))}
Platform Type Account Default Action Status Added Actions
{asset.platformName} {asset.assetType.replace('_', ' ')} {asset.accountIdentifier} {asset.actionType} {asset.status} {new Date(asset.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()}
)} {trustedContacts.length === 0 ? (

No Trusted Contacts Added

Add trusted individuals who can verify death events and oversee your digital legacy policies.

Important: Choose people you trust completely. They will have the ability to verify death events and execute your digital legacy policies. ) : (
Trusted Contacts ({trustedContacts.length})
 {trustedContacts.map((contact) => ( ))}
Name Email Phone Relationship Status Added Actions
{contact.name} {contact.email} {contact.phone ? ( {contact.phone} ) : ( )} {contact.relationship} {contact.status} {new Date(contact.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()}
)} {/* Add Asset Modal */} setShowAssetModal(false)} size="lg"> Add Digital Asset
Asset Type setNewAsset({...newAsset, assetType: e.target.value})} required > Default Action setNewAsset({...newAsset, actionType: e.target.value})} required > Platform Name setNewAsset({...newAsset, platformName: e.target.value})} required /> Account Identifier setNewAsset({...newAsset, accountIdentifier: e.target.value})} required /> This information will be encrypted using AES-256 encryption Additional Notes (Optional) setNewAsset({...newAsset, credentials: e.target.value})} /> All sensitive data is encrypted and stored securely
{/* Add Contact Modal */} setShowContactModal(false)} size="lg"> Add Trusted Contact Important: Trusted contacts can verify death events and execute your digital legacy policies. Choose people you trust completely and who understand the responsibility.
Full Name setNewContact({...newContact, name: e.target.value})} required /> Relationship setNewContact({...newContact, relationship: e.target.value})} required > Email Address setNewContact({...newContact, email: e.target.value})} required /> Phone Number (Optional) setNewContact({...newContact, phone: e.target.value})} />
); } export default UserVault;
